statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE id > 3;
SELECT id, name FROM suppliers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name FROM suppliers WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT contact_person, location FROM suppliers WHERE name LIKE '%Inc%' AND location='California';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY id DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT products.product_name, products.price, suppliers.supplier_name FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_id, supplier_name;

SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;

SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
